T

text - package text
 
tokenize(String) - Method in class text.Tokenizer
Removes punctuation attached to the left or right of each word in the input, as well as stopwords (if defined by the constructor).
tokenize(String) - Method in class text.TwitterTokenizer
Tokenizes the text with the specialized TwitterTokenizer.isWordCharacter(Character) method, then glues the special chacartes back onto the following word.
Tokenizer - Class in text
General-purpose tokenizer using a BreakIterator word instance.
Tokenizer(Stopwords) - Constructor for class text.Tokenizer
Creates a Tokenizer that will remove stopwords from the input text.
toString() - Method in class client.TwitterUser
 
toString() - Method in class util.SimilarityResult
 
TwitterClient - Class in client
Uses the Twitter API to create a client to communicate with the Twitter web service, gather information about users, and return TwitterUser instances containing the information most useful for similarity computations.
TwitterClient(String, String) - Constructor for class client.TwitterClient
Constructs a Twitter API instance.
TwitterTokenizer - Class in text
Extends the general tokenizer by adding @ and # as valid word characters because of their special meaning in Twitter text strings.
TwitterTokenizer(Stopwords) - Constructor for class text.TwitterTokenizer
 
TwitterUser - Class in client
A wrapper around useful data retrieved about a user through the Twitter API.
TwitterUser(String) - Constructor for class client.TwitterUser
Note that this is the only way to set the user's login name.
